title: Strengthening Business Strategy Competencies: Science Project-Based Learning Design with AI Chatbots

context.prior_knowledge: Basic science knowledge and digital literacy
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for Corporate Management/HR Professionals

learning_goals: At least 80% of learners can present creative problem-solving approaches to scientific topics using AI chatbots.
Learners revise project deliverables at least three times based on peer and AI feedback and finalize the output (report/presentation).
Learners can write reflective journals on ethical considerations when using AI tools for educational purposes.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
